entry.title: Marigolds and Apple Blossoms
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,719Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 56

Summary: His two brothers stared at him. “Are you gonna swipe right or…” Dick trailed off.  He stared back.  Damian tutted, “Are you implying my sister is not good enough for you, Todd?” Jason laughed, oh it was quite the opposite. “You think I’m good enough for her, kid?” --- Where Jason and the reader were the closest growing up in the Wayne family, but are oblivious to each other's feelings. When Barbara snitches on Jason being on a dating app, the family schemes together to get the two idiots blindly in love together. Fluff, angst, and everything in between ensues.

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,787Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two ending depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,705Chapters: 8/18Kudos: 118

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.

entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,774Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.title: frankenstein
entry.summary:
Author: floricita

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,365Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: jason todd is pretty sure he died. he remembers the joker, his mother, the bomb ticking, the explosion. he remembers dying. that's why he's confused when he wakes up one day, breathing, heart pumping, and buried six feet under. he's alive. and he doesn't know how. let alone why. but one things for certain, he needs to climb his way out of this grave before he experiences death twice. or… in which, you find someone crawling out of their grave and nearly have a heart attack. — she!reader / jason todd— set during the rh:utrh (comic)— lowercase intended— can also be found on wattpad!
